enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding steps to the FromBuilder, which can be reused for setting up the state.
Both methods modify the state of the FromBuilder by adding steps, which can be reused for setting up the state.
The build() method should be invoked after addAll() to ensure all steps are processed and the final state is built.
The clear() method should be invoked before addAll() if the FromBuilder needs to be reset before adding new steps.
